titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in New Brentford Church in Middlesex December the 2d. 1697. Being the thanksgiving-day to almighty God for His Majesty's safe return, and for the happy and honourable peace, of which God hath made him the glorious instrument. By Christopher Johnson, M.A. School-master of Richmond in Surrey.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Christopher, b. 1657 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by F. Collins, for Samuel Buckley at the Dolphin over against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
